revised_title: Deciphering an Ancient Inscription on the Roman Wall
tldr: This article explains the discovery and analysis of an ancient inscription found on the Roman Wall in England. The inscription, dedicated to Caracalla, provides information about a cohort of Varduli, a people from Hispania citerior. The author, John Taylor, discusses the meaning and context of the inscription, including the use of abbreviations and the military units involved.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History
